tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Understand the architecture of this workshop and what it can do

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Environment Setup
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Oracle Transparent Data Encryption (TDE)
tutorials.description: In this lab you can see how to leverage Oracle Transparent Data Encryption (TDE) features

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Oracle Data Redaction
tutorials.description: In this lab you can see how to leverage Oracle Data Redaction features

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Oracle Database Vault (DV)
tutorials.description: In this lab you can see how to leverage Oracle Database Vault features

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Oracle Label Security (OLS)
tutorials.description: In this lab you will learn how to leverage OLS to track consent and force restriction for GDPR

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Oracle Data Masking and Subsetting (DMS)
tutorials.description: This lab will walk you through how to enable Database Vault for the workshop image

tutorials.title: Lab 9: Oracle Audit Vault
tutorials.description: In this lab you can see how to leverage Oracle Audit Vault Appliance

tutorials.title: Lab 10: Oracle Database Firewall
tutorials.description: In this lab you can see how to leverage Oracle Database Firewall Appliance

tutorials.title: Lab 11: Oracle Key Vault
tutorials.description: In this lab you can see how to leverage Oracle Key Vault Appliance
